thread.title: Re: ‘Shame on you’: Conservatives blast Bill Kristol for this post-Flynn resignation tweet
thread.title_full: Re: ‘Shame on you’: Conservatives blast Bill Kristol for this post-Flynn resignation tweet

author: Karla1953
title: Re: ‘Shame on you’: Conservatives blast Bill Kristol for this post-Flynn resignation tweet
text:
— ❤️Jayvie ❤️ (@OneFineJay) February 14, 2017 
The Weekly Standard’s Bill Kristol has made no secret of his opposition to Trump. Last spring, he even spearheaded a search for an independent opposition candidate. 
But this morning, Kristol may have taken things a bit too far, tweeting this in response to reports that leaks of classified info ultimately lead to Michael Flynn’s resignation : Obviously strongly prefer normal democratic and constitutional politics. But if it comes to it, prefer the deep state to the Trump state. 
— Bill Kristol (@BillKristol) February 14, 2017 
He’s taking some major heat from conservatives over that one. @BillKristol I prefer the elected to the unelected. 
— Ben Domenech (@bdomenech) February 14, 2017 In the long run, the former is actually much more dangerous to democratic self-government. https://t.co/tKn9LmuqID 
— Dan McLaughlin (@baseballcrank) February 14, 2017 Lois Lerner felt the same way about illegal targeting of conservatives. https://t.co/ZC6TZgu1LG 
— Sean Davis (@seanmdav) February 14, 2017 @BillKristol Clearly you do not actually prefer normal democratic and constitutional politics. 
Retire. 
— Christopher R Taylor (@KestrelArts) February 14, 2017 I prefer democracy to tyranny @BillKristol pic.twitter.com/kJbUbWyqRp
